Command-Line Interface¶

code¶

class R:
    def __init__(self):
        self.yo = 'yo!'
        self.giorno = 'cat'

r = R()
assert r.giorno == 'cat'

var i = 'yo';

if (i !== 'yo')
{
    console.log('something very strange has happened');
}
